exercises.name: biceps pull-up
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your palms facing away from you and your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull yourself up by bending your elbows, bringing your chest towards the bar.
Step:3 Pause at the top of the movement, then slowly lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

exercises.name: body-up
instructions: Step:1 Start by placing your hands on a raised surface, such as a bench or parallel bars, with your palms facing down and fingers pointing forward.
Step:2 Extend your legs out in front of you, keeping your heels on the ground and your body straight.
Step:3 Lower your body by bending your elbows, keeping them close to your sides, until your upper arms are parallel to the ground.
Step:4 Pause for a moment, then push through your palms to straighten your arms and lift your body back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

exercises.name: bodyweight squatting row (with towel)
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding a towel in front of you with your palms facing down.
Step:2 Bend your knees and lower your body into a squat position, keeping your back straight and your chest up.
Step:3 As you lower into the squat, simultaneously pull the towel towards your chest, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom of the squat, then slowly return to the starting position while extending your arms.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

exercises.name: 3/4 sit-up
instructions: Step:1 Lie flat on your back with your knees bent and feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands behind your head with your elbows pointing outwards.
Step:3 Engaging your abs, slowly lift your upper body off the ground, curling forward until your torso is at a 45-degree angle.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your upper body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

exercises.name: bench hip extension
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your back against the bench and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Place your hands on the bench for support.
Step:3 Engage your glutes and hamstrings, then lift your hips off the bench until your body forms a straight line from your knees to your shoulders.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your hips back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

exercises.name: bodyweight squatting row
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart, holding onto a sturdy object or suspension trainer with your arms extended.
Step:2 Lower your body into a squat position, keeping your back straight and your knees behind your toes.
Step:3 From the squat position, pull your body up towards the object or suspension trainer, squeezing your shoulder blades together.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower your body back down to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

exercises.name: bodyweight drop jump squat
instructions: Step:1 Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Lower your body into a squat position by bending your knees and pushing your hips back.
Step:3 Jump up explosively, extending your hips, knees, and ankles.
Step:4 While in mid-air, quickly bring your feet together.
Step:5 Land softly on the balls of your feet and immediately drop back into a squat position.
Step:6 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

exercises.name: biceps leg concentration curl
instructions: Step:1 Sit on a bench with your legs spread apart and your feet flat on the ground.
Step:2 Hold a dumbbell in one hand and place your elbow on the inside of your thigh, just above the knee.
Step:3 With your palm facing up, curl the dumbbell towards your shoulder while keeping your upper arm stationary.
Step:4 Squeeze your biceps at the top of the movement, then slowly lower the dumbbell back to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions, then switch arms.

exercises.name: biceps narrow pull-ups
instructions: Step:1 Hang from a pull-up bar with your palms facing towards you and your hands shoulder-width apart.
Step:2 Engage your core and pull yourself up towards the bar, focusing on using your biceps to lift your body.
Step:3 Pause for a moment at the top, then slowly lower yourself back down to the starting position.
Step:4 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.

exercises.name: bench dip (knees bent)
instructions: Step:1 Sit on the edge of a bench or chair with your hands gripping the edge next to your hips.
Step:2 Slide your butt off the bench and straighten your legs in front of you, keeping your heels on the ground.
Step:3 Bend your elbows and lower your body towards the ground, keeping your back close to the bench.
Step:4 Pause for a moment at the bottom, then push yourself back up to the starting position.
Step:5 Repeat for the desired number of repetitions.
